#summary 信息提取
#labels free,cms,freecms,java,开源,免费,内容管理系统

= 信息提取=
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<strong style="line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">从FreeCMS 1.4 开始支持</strong></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	从左侧管理菜单点击信息提取进入。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084123_NFbn_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084123_NFbn_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	默认提取所有信息，可以选择站点、栏目、信息关键字进行搜索。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	选择需要提取的信息，点击"提取到栏目"按钮。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084140_NN9K_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084140_NN9K_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	选择需要提取到的栏目，如"要点"<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">.</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084157_rmzf_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084157_rmzf_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	点击"确定"。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084211_G8Hn_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084211_G8Hn_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	提取成功，可以进入"要点"栏目查看到提取的信息。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084232_5bMM_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084232_5bMM_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
